data.introduce: 国内客票变更搜索服务(AirTicketReShop)为用户提供了查询国内自动退改签航班信息功能为一体的服务。
data.functions:
支持根据航段信息，历史票号，查询日期来查询国内退改签航班信息；
只支持按单张客票进行搜索；
如单张客户中有两段均未使用，只希望变更其中一段，需在请求中填入两段行程，不变更的一段<changed>字段填false；
不支持联票查询；
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"OTA_AirTicketReShopRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国内退改签TRR查询","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"销售点信息：POS信息涉及到用户后台指定 的访问授权，用户所在的销售 地点，用户缺省使用的航空公 司等信息。","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"airlinecode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"发起换开请求的换开航空公司代码","children":[]},{"name":"iatacode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"ICS 写入AGNET CODE ， 如果AGENT
										CODE 为空，则写入99999992。
										CRS 如果在IATA NUMBER 不为空的情
										况下， 写入IATA NUMBER ， 如果
										IATANUMBER 为空， 则写入AGENT
										CODE。如果都为空，写入99999992","children":[]},{"name":"CityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"城市代码","children":[]},{"name":"PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"BookingOrderID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"订单号","children":[]},{"name":"FlightSegments","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"行程信息","children":[{"name":"FlightSegment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"operationCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"承运方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"实际承运航空公司两字码，例：CA","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代码上下文","children":[]},{"name":"@CompanyShortName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司名称","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号（例如：1831）","children":[]}]},{"name":"departure","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达机场三字码","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代码上下文","children":[]},{"name":"@Terminal","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航站楼","children":[]},{"name":"@Gate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"登机口","children":[]},{"name":"@DepartureType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"按机场还是按城市查询；AIRPORT表示机场，CITY表示城市","children":[]}]},{"name":"arrival","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代码上下文","children":[]},{"name":"@Terminal","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航站楼","children":[]},{"name":"@Gate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出站口","children":[]},{"name":"@BaggageClaim","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"取行李处","children":[]},{"name":"@Diversion","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@ArrivalType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"按机场还是按城市查询；AIRPORT表示机场，CITY表示城市","children":[]}]},{"name":"equipment","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机型信息","children":[{"name":"@AirEquipType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"飞机型号","children":[]},{"name":"@ChangeofGauge","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否换过飞机","children":[]}]},{"name":"marketingCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司两字码","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代码上下文","children":[]},{"name":"@CompanyShortName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司名称","children":[]}]},{"name":"flightno","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号","children":[]},{"name":"querydepdate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"对应新航班的起飞日期，如20170930","children":[]},{"name":"departureTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班起飞时间","children":[]},{"name":"type","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段类型：NORMAL、 ARRIVAL_UNKNOWN、OPEN","children":[]},{"name":"actionCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"行动代码","children":[]},{"name":"cabin","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位代码：舱位代码，如：Y","children":[]},{"name":"changed","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"如果该航段是需要变更的则写true，如果该航段是原有未飞的航段，则写false","children":[]},{"name":"TicketNumber_Before","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"13位校验，可以带-：旧票号","children":[]},{"name":"IsInfant","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否是婴儿","children":[]},{"name":"PassName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"姓名","children":[]},{"name":"PassID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客序号，如P1","children":[]},{"name":"PassCount","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客数量","children":[]},{"name":"InvoluntaryIdentifier","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否是非自愿","children":[]},{"name":"CabinClass","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"指定仅查询某个服务等级舱位 F/C/Y 默认不指定查询所有服务等级最低价","children":[]}]}]}]}]

            <departureTime>2024-03-18T06:55:00</departureTime>
            <type>NORMAL</type>
            <cabin>Y</cabin>
            <changed>true</changed>
